decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s):
Ground Fl Plans, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 01, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
First Fl Plans, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 02, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Loft Plans, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 03, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Proposed Loft Plans, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 04, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Roof Plans, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 05, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Front Elevations, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 06, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Rear Elevations, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 07, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Side Elevation Existing, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 08, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Proposed Side Elevation, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 09, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Section A-A' Existing, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 10, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,
Section A-A' Proposed, Job No. LW20230101, Drawing No. 11, dated February 2024, Revision 210224,

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Rear roof extension, side roof extension and installation of three roof lights to front and rear roofslope
